projects.title: AskCUI
projects.description: AskCUI serves as a one stop comprehensive solution for university students, providing a centralized platform for inquiries, document retrieval, communication, sharing experiences and information on campus amenities including hostels and food points.

projects.title: Carrier Network
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. Streamlined carrier onboarding within carrier-network of Dispatch-one (Transportation Management System). It provides detailed insights into carrier documents, invitation, truck types, multiple geographical locations and much more to enhance operational efficiency.

projects.title: Dispatch Dashboard
projects.description: Worked on dispatch-dashboard in Dispatch-one ( Transportation management system ). Dispatch dashboard helps dispatchers to dispatch loads directly to carriers, chatting with carriers and load reporting processes, fostering seamless communication between dispatchers and carriers.
